Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #fairy outside Hyrule Castle# holds #a Heart Container#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Song of Storms#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #a Goron Tunic#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #a Small Key#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that in #Goron City# the hammer unlocks #a Hookshot#.
